changeNote:
v2.0: Bird Coop update!

* Added the Bird Coop system
* Added open books, standing books, bookcases, inkpots and quills
* Added ServerSettings for managing several aspects of the mod
* Fixed book layout issue on ultra-widescreen resolutions
* Fixed some layout issues with images
